en: National Emblem of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主权的象征和标志。由清华大学建筑系设计小组集体创作，于1950年9月20日由中央人民政府公布。
description.en: The symbol and mark of sovereignty of the People's Republic of China. Collectively created by a design team from the Department of Architecture at Tsinghua University and promulgated by the Central People's Government on September 20, 1950.

nodes.id: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组

zh-cn: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组
en: Tsinghua University Department of Architecture National Emblem Design Group

description.zh-cn: 1950年为设计中华人民共和国国徽而成立的专家小组，由梁思成、林徽因等人组成，负责国徽的设计工作。
description.en: An expert group established in 1950 to design the national emblem of the People's Republic of China, composed of Liang Sicheng, Lin Huiyin, and others, responsible for the design work of the national emblem.

description.zh-cn: 中国建筑学家，清华大学建筑系教授，领导了中华人民共和国国徽的设计工作。
description.en: Chinese architect, professor at the Department of Architecture at Tsinghua University, who led the design work of the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国建筑学家、作家，清华大学建筑系教授，中华人民共和国国徽设计小组的主要成员。
description.en: Chinese architect and writer, professor at the Department of Architecture at Tsinghua University, and a key member of the design group for the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组成员。
description.en: Member of the Tsinghua University Department of Architecture National Emblem Design Group.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组成员。
description.en: Member of the Tsinghua University Department of Architecture National Emblem Design Group.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组成员。
description.en: Member of the Tsinghua University Department of Architecture National Emblem Design Group.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学建筑系教授，负责规范和简化国徽的几何设计图稿，完成了最终的定型设计。
description.en: Professor at the Department of Architecture, Tsinghua University, who was responsible for standardizing and simplifying the geometric design of the national emblem, completing the final version.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全国委员会
en: First National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的政治协商机关，其第二次会议提出了最终的国徽方案。
description.en: The political consultative body of the People's Republic of China, whose second session proposed the final national emblem design.

description.zh-cn: 1949年至1954年间中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，其第八次会议正式通过了国徽图案。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954, which officially adopted the national emblem design at its eighth meeting.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。他以中央人民政府主席的名义发布命令，正式公布了国徽。
description.en: The principal founder and first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. He issued an order in the name of the Chairman of the Central People's Government to officially promulgate the national emblem.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。他曾亲自说服梁思成，要求国徽图案中必须包含天安门。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China. He personally persuaded Liang Sicheng, insisting that the national emblem design must include Tiananmen.

description.zh-cn: 1919年发生于中国的反帝、反封建的爱国运动。国徽中的天安门图案象征着五四运动这一新民主主义革命的发源地。
description.en: An anti-imperialist and anti-feudal patriotic movement in China in 1919. The Tiananmen motif in the national emblem symbolizes the May Fourth Movement as the origin of the New Democratic Revolution.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国徽法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国徽法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on the National Emblem

description.zh-cn: 一部规范中华人民共和国国徽使用的全国性法律，于1991年通过并施行。
description.en: A national law regulating the use of the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China, passed and implemented in 1991.

nodes.id: 第七届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第七届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 7th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的常设机关，其第十八次会议通过了《中华人民共和国国徽法》。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, which passed the Law of the People's Republic of China on the National Emblem at its 18th session.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本法，其中第一百三十七条对国徽作出了规定，并确认其法律地位。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China. Article 137 provides for the national emblem and confirms its legal status.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。国徽中的五颗星象征着中国共产党的领导。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China. The five stars in the national emblem symbolize the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学下设的院系，其师生组成了国徽设计小组的主体。
description.en: A department within Tsinghua University, whose faculty and students formed the core of the national emblem design group.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府，其建筑系师生主导了中华人民共和国国徽的设计工作。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Beijing, China, whose Department of Architecture faculty and students led the design work for the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组

description.zh-cn: 集体创作了中华人民共和国国徽的最终选定方案。
description.en: Collectively created the final selected design for the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组

description.zh-cn: 梁思成是清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组的领导者和核心成员。
description.en: Liang Sicheng was the leader and a core member of the Tsinghua University Department of Architecture National Emblem Design Group.

relationships.target: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组

description.zh-cn: 林徽因是清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组的主要成员。
description.en: Lin Huiyin was a key member of the Tsinghua University Department of Architecture National Emblem Design Group.

relationships.target: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组
清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组
清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组

description.zh-cn: 在梁思成推荐下，高庄规范并简化了国徽的几何设计图稿，完成了最终定型。
description.en: Upon Liang Sicheng's recommendation, Gao Zhuang standardized and simplified the geometric design of the national emblem, completing its final version.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 其第二次会议通过决议，同意采用清华大学设计组的国徽方案。
description.en: Its second session passed a resolution to adopt the national emblem design proposed by the Tsinghua University design group.

description.zh-cn: 其第八次会议正式通过了中华人民共和国国徽图案。
description.en: Its eighth meeting officially adopted the design of the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 以中央人民政府主席的名义发布命令，正式公布了中华人民共和国国徽。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central People's Government, issued an order to officially promulgate the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来邀约并说服梁思成，要求其组织的国徽设计工作中必须包含天安门图案。
description.en: Zhou Enlai met with and persuaded Liang Sicheng, insisting that the national emblem design he was organizing must include the Tiananmen motif.

description.zh-cn: 国徽中的天安门图案象征着五四运动这一新民主主义革命的发源地。
description.en: The Tiananmen motif in the national emblem symbolizes the May Fourth Movement as the origin of the New Democratic Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 作为中华人民共和国的缔造者和执政党，主导了包括国徽在内的国家象征的创立。国徽的设计亦体现了其领导地位。
description.en: As the founder and ruling party of the PRC, it led the creation of national symbols, including the national emblem. The emblem's design also reflects its leadership role.

relationships.source: 第七届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国徽法

description.zh-cn: 其第十八次会议通过了《中华人民共和国国徽法》。
description.en: Its 18th session passed the 'Law of the People's Republic of China on the National Emblem'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国徽法

description.zh-cn: 该法律以立法的形式规范了国徽的使用，并确认了其法律地位。
description.en: This law legislatively standardizes the use of the national emblem and confirms its legal status.

description.zh-cn: 《宪法》规定了国徽的图案内容，并确认了其作为国家象征的法律地位。
description.en: The Constitution specifies the content of the national emblem's design and confirms its legal status as a national symbol.

relationships.source: 清华大学建筑系国徽设计小组

description.zh-cn: 国徽设计小组是由清华大学建筑系师生组成的。
description.en: The national emblem design group was composed of faculty and students from the Department of Architecture at Tsinghua University.
